# m_value

**Instance Property**

The control value matched by this description.

## Declaration

```swift
IOUserAudioSelectorValue m_value;
```

## Accessing Description Properties

- **m_name**: The name of the selector value.
- **IOUserAudioSelectorValue**: The type of values managed by a selector control.
